text:
@LuckyHeronSay @BorisJohnson @MattHancock Most will say it was being slow on lockdown - and this absolutely correct.

However, when all of this is done, there will be a monumental scandal regarding the government’s handling of Coronavirus in care homes. There are so many people being gagged about it right now.
